title: Add testing scripts to root package.json
description:
Add new npm scripts for testing workflows:

Scripts to add:
- test:setup
- test:teardown
- test:integration
- test:docker:up
- test:docker:down
- test:e2e
- test:e2e:ui
- test:e2e:headed

Update /package.json

title: Write E2E tests for dashboard navigation
description:
Create /tests/e2e/dashboard.spec.ts

Test cases:
- Dashboard loads with correct data
- Navigation between sections
- Recent meal plans display
- Status badges render correctly
- Generate button works
- View meal plan navigation
- Protected route redirects

Navigation and data display

title: Create E2E test data fixtures
description:
Create /tests/e2e/helpers/fixtures.ts

Test data:
- Valid user credentials
- Invalid credentials
- Registration data
- Preference updates
- Expected meal plan data

Constants for E2E tests

title: Create database fixtures directory structure
description:
Create directory and base fixture files:

Directories:
- /packages/database/fixtures/

Files to create (empty JSON arrays initially):
- users.json
- preferences.json
- meal-plans.json
- meal-records.json

Sets foundation for seed data

title: Create user fixture data
description:
Create /packages/database/fixtures/users.json with 5 test users:

Users with bcrypt-hashed passwords:
1. test1@example.com - Extensive history
2. test2@example.com - Moderate history
3. test3@example.com - Light history
4. test4@example.com - New user
5. test5@example.com - Edge case user

Include proper password hashes for 'Password123!'

title: Create .env.test configuration
description:
Create /.env.test with test-specific values:

Variables:
- DATABASE_URL (test database)
- REDIS_URL (test redis)
- NEXTAUTH_URL (localhost test port)
- NEXTAUTH_SECRET (test secret)
- ANTHROPIC_API_KEY (from main env)
- GMAIL credentials (test mode)
- NODE_ENV=test

Document in .env.example

title: Create preferences fixture data
description:
Create /packages/database/fixtures/preferences.json

Preferences for all 5 test users with varied configurations:
- Different meal counts (5-14)
- Different servings (2-6)
- Varied protein/calorie targets
- Different dietary restrictions
- HEB enabled/disabled
- Various email recipients

title: Write E2E tests for preferences management
description:
Create /tests/e2e/preferences.spec.ts

Test cases:
- Load current preferences
- Update meal settings
- Add/remove dietary restrictions
- Add/remove email recipients
- Email validation
- Save preferences
- Schedule settings (read-only)

CRUD operations on preferences

title: Update CLAUDE.md with new testing practices and requirements
Create mock authentication handlers
description:
Create /apps/web/mocks/handlers/auth.ts

Implement mock handlers for:
- POST /api/auth/register
- POST /api/auth/[...nextauth]
- Session validation

Bypass NextAuth and return mock session data

title: Create mock mode toggle system
description:
Create mock mode infrastructure:

Files to create:
- /apps/web/lib/mock-mode.ts - Check MOCK_MODE env var
- /apps/web/mocks/index.ts - Export all handlers
- Update /apps/web/.env.example - Add MOCK_MODE=false

Modify API routes to check mock mode and return mock data when enabled

title: Install Playwright testing framework
description:
Install Playwright dependencies:

Commands:
- pnpm add -D @playwright/test
- pnpm add -D dotenv
- npx playwright install

Creates browser binaries for testing

title: Create mock meal plan API handlers
description:
Create /apps/web/mocks/handlers/meal-plans.ts

Implement mock handlers for:
- POST /api/meal-plans/generate
- GET /api/meal-plans/status/[jobId]
- GET /api/meal-plans
- GET /api/meal-plans/[id]
- DELETE /api/meal-plans/[id]

Return data from mock data modules

title: Create run-integration-tests.sh script
description:
Create /scripts/run-integration-tests.sh

Orchestrates full integration test cycle:
1. Run test-setup.sh
2. Execute smoke tests
3. Execute API integration tests (future)
4. Run test-teardown.sh
5. Report results

Exit with proper codes for CI/CD
Make executable

title: Create manual testing checklist
description:
Create /docs/testing/MANUAL_CHECKLIST.md

Complete checklist for all 9 pages:
1. Landing Page
2. Login Page
3. Register Page
4. Dashboard Page
5. Generate Page
6. Meal Plans List Page
7. Meal Plan Detail Page
8. Analytics Page
9. Preferences Page

For each page:
- Interactive elements to test
- Expected behaviors
- Edge cases
- Error scenarios
- Checkbox format for tracking

Plus cross-functional tests:
- Authentication flow
- Authorization checks
- Data integrity
- Error handling
- Performance checks

Plus browser compatibility:
- Desktop: Chrome, Firefox, Safari
- Mobile: Safari iOS, Chrome Android

title: Create meal plan fixture data
description:
Create /packages/database/fixtures/meal-plans.json with 20+ meal plans

Distribution:
- 15 COMPLETED plans across users
- 2 PROCESSING plans
- 2 PENDING plans
- 1 FAILED plan

Include all metadata: weekStartDate, generatedAt, claudeModel, iterationCount, emailSent

title: Create mock preferences API handlers
description:
Create /apps/web/mocks/handlers/preferences.ts

Implement mock handlers for:
- GET /api/users/preferences
- PUT /api/users/preferences
- GET /api/users/schedule
- PUT /api/users/schedule

Return data from mock data modules

title: Create E2E authentication helpers
description:
Create /tests/e2e/helpers/auth.ts

Helpers:
- login(page, email, password)
- register(page, userData)
- logout(page)
- getAuthenticatedPage(browser)

Reusable across all test specs

title: Create testing documentation structure
description:
Create /docs/testing/ directory and TESTING.md main file

Files to create:
- /docs/TESTING.md (main guide)
- /docs/testing/ (directory)

This establishes the documentation foundation for all testing efforts.

title: Create test-setup.sh script
description:
Create /scripts/test-setup.sh

Steps:
1. Start docker-compose.test.yml
2. Wait for all services healthy (polling)
3. Run database migrations
4. Run seed script
5. Verify all services responding
6. Run smoke tests
7. Output test environment URLs

Make executable with proper error handling

title: Write E2E tests for meal plan generation
description:
Create /tests/e2e/meal-plan-generation.spec.ts

Test cases:
- Generate button starts job
- Progress bar updates
- Status polling works
- All steps complete
- Auto-redirect after completion
- Error handling for failures
- View generated meal plan

Critical user flow - most important test

title: Create regression testing guide
description:
Create /docs/testing/REGRESSION_TESTS.md

Pre-release regression suite:
- Critical path: Register → Login → Preferences → Generate → View Plan
- All CRUD operations
- All API endpoints
- Email functionality
- Job queue processing
- Schedule functionality
- Multi-user isolation
- Edge cases

Complete test before production release

title: Create mock preferences data module
description:
Create /apps/web/mocks/data/preferences.ts

Include preferences for all 3 test users with varied settings:
- Different meal counts (5, 7, 14)
- Different serving sizes (2, 4)
- Various dietary restrictions
- Different email recipients

title: Create comprehensive TESTING.md guide
description:
Create /docs/TESTING.md with sections:

Sections:
- Overview of testing strategy
- Quick start guides for each level
- Prerequisites and setup
- Running tests locally
- Running tests in Docker
- Running E2E tests
- Manual testing checklist reference
- Troubleshooting common issues

Main entry point for all testing docs

title: Implement database seed script
description:
Create /packages/database/src/seed.ts

Features:
- Load fixture data from JSON files
- Clear existing data (in test mode only)
- Seed users, preferences, meal plans, meal records
- Maintain referential integrity
- Log progress
- Error handling

Update package.json seed script to run this file
Add DATABASE_URL validation
Add --force flag for production warning

title: Create CI/CD workflow for E2E tests
description:
Create /.github/workflows/e2e-tests.yml

Workflow:
- Trigger on: push, pull_request
- Setup: Node, pnpm, Playwright
- Start test environment
- Run migrations and seed
- Execute E2E tests
- Upload test reports
- Upload failure screenshots/videos
- Cleanup

Automated testing in CI

title: Write E2E tests for authentication flows
description:
Create /tests/e2e/auth.spec.ts

Test cases:
- User registration (valid)
- User registration (validation errors)
- User login (valid)
- User login (invalid credentials)
- Password requirements
- Session persistence
- Logout flow

Full auth flow coverage

title: Create mock meal plans data module
description:
Create /apps/web/mocks/data/meal-plans.ts with 10+ sample meal plans:

Include varied statuses:
- PENDING (1)
- PROCESSING (1)
- COMPLETED (7)
- FAILED (1)

Include complete meal records with nutrition, ingredients, instructions

title: Create docker-compose.test.yml
description:
Create /docker-compose.test.yml for isolated testing:

Services:
- postgres-test (separate from dev)
- redis-test (separate from dev)
- web-test
- worker-test

Features:
- Different ports than dev
- Test database name
- Health checks
- Volume mounts
- Test-specific env vars

title: Create E2E test directory structure
description:
Create directory structure:

Directories:
- /tests/e2e/
- /tests/e2e/helpers/
- /tests/e2e/fixtures/

This provides foundation for E2E tests

title: Create Playwright configuration
description:
Create /playwright.config.ts

Configuration:
- Test directory: /tests/e2e/
- Base URL: http://localhost:3000
- Browsers: chromium, firefox, webkit
- Retries: 2
- Timeout: 30000
- Screenshot on failure
- Video on first retry
- HTML reporter
- Parallel execution

title: Create mock data directory structure
description:
Create directory structure for mock data:

Directories to create:
- /apps/web/mocks/
- /apps/web/mocks/data/
- /apps/web/mocks/handlers/

This provides the foundation for mock data infrastructure.

title: Create mock user data module
description:
Create /apps/web/mocks/data/users.ts with 3 test users:

Users:
1. brian@test.com - Admin user with extensive meal history
2. allison@test.com - Regular user with some history
3. newuser@test.com - New user with no history

Include: id, email, name, hashed passwords

title: Create test-teardown.sh script
description:
Create /scripts/test-teardown.sh

Steps:
1. Stop all test containers
2. Remove test volumes (-v flag)
3. Clean up test data
4. Remove temporary files
5. Output cleanup confirmation

Make executable with proper error handling

title: Create meal record fixture data
description:
Create /packages/database/fixtures/meal-records.json with 140+ meals

For each completed meal plan (7 meals each):
- Complete nutrition data
- Varied ingredients (arrays of {item, amount})
- Detailed instructions (numbered steps)
- prepTime and cookTime
- Realistic recipe data

Include varied meal types: high-protein, vegan, vegetarian, keto

title: Create smoke testing guide
description:
Create /docs/testing/SMOKE_TESTS.md

Quick smoke tests:
- Health endpoint check
- Database connection
- Redis connection
- Web service responding
- Worker process running
- Can create user
- Can login
- Can view dashboard

Quick confidence check (< 5 minutes)
Documents existing smoke-test-*.sh scripts
